getBurnRequest(uint256).details: Returns the fields present in the request struct and also the request hash

getMintRequest(uint256).details: Returns the fields present in the request struct and also the request hash

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addMintRequest(uint256).notice: Allows a user to initiate a mint request

burn(uint256).notice: Allows a merchant to initiate a burn request

confirmBurnRequest(bytes32).notice: Allows a issuer to confirm a burn request

confirmMintRequest(bytes32,uint256).notice: Allows a issuer to confirm a mint request

getBurnRequest(uint256).notice: Gets a burn request by nonce

getMintRequest(uint256).notice: Gets a mint request by nonce

setIssuer(address).notice: Allows the owner of the contract to set the issuer
